question: Hey, do you know why the cafeteria food always tastes so strange?
You know what's even stranger? I saw a squirrel carrying a whole slice of pizza across the quad today!
Can you explain to me how you managed to get an A+ on that exam without studying?
Speaking of exams, did you hear about the professor who accidentally sent out the answer key instead of the review materials?
Why do you think our football team keeps losing every game this season?
Losing games reminds me of that time I lost my keys in the library and found them in the refrigerator in the break room!
Why do you think our biology professor always wears those colorful bow ties?
How come you never seem to run out of snacks during our study sessions?
Speaking of snacks, have you tried the new bakery that just opened up nearby? Their pastries are incredible!
Do you know why our campus Wi-Fi is always so slow?
Slow Wi-Fi can be annoying, but have you checked out the computer lab's internet speeds? They have an impressive gaming setup there too!
Why do you think our campus squirrels are so fearless around people?
That's an interesting question! What do you think makes them so comfortable around humans?
How come everyone seems to love that new superhero movie?
Hmm, what do you think makes a movie universally appealing to people?
Why does it always rain when I forget my umbrella?
Funny how that happens, isn't it? What do you think the odds are of forgetting your umbrella on a rainy day?
Why does the pizza place on campus always have such long lines?
You know, that's a great observation! Their pizza must be incredibly popular. Have you tried the new sushi place instead?
Do you have any idea why it's so hard to find parking around here?
Why do you think our professor assigns so much reading every week?
Wow, you're really observant! I suppose they want us to be well-prepared for class. Did you catch the latest episode of that new TV show last night?
Why do you think the coffee from the campus cafe is always so strong?
How come our university mascot is a platypus?
A platypus mascot? That makes me think of when I visited Australia and saw a real platypus for the first time. They're such fascinating creatures!
Why do people always seem to wear flip-flops to class, even when it's cold outside?
Why do you think our chemistry professor always uses so many puns during lectures?
Well, I guess it's because they have great chemistry with their jokes! Have you heard the one about the neutron who walked into a bar?
How come the campus library is always so cold?

How come the campus library is always so cold?
Do you know why the campus Wi-Fi is always so slow?
Can you explain the entire history of our university's sports teams?
What's the secret to making the perfect cup of coffee?
Why do you think everyone's so obsessed with that new TV show?
How come our campus gym is always so crowded in the evenings?
